English: Road to Morton
Northernmost point
Man, this is actually a strong one!
Stolichnaya, my comrade. The best liquor to keep your spirits high and your body warm!\nIsn't it getting cold?
Then drink more! Here, let's open another. Cheers, Ippolit!
Cheers, Igor! Bottoms up!
It certainly gives you a new perspective! You see the world im a different way!
My man, now you speak my language! Vodka brings comrades together! If only the Americans would have tasted it, this whole business would be long over!
You're on to something there, comrade. We could try to send them few crates instead of rockets and see where it goes.
A grandiose idea! That deserves a drink! Cheers, Igor!
Cheers, Ippolit!
Those two were made for each other.
True soulmates. So, where were we?
I was telling you about Ekaterina, the light of my life.
In love, are you?
Absolutely and unconditionally. The moment I laid my eyes on her I knew I was lost and I would spend the rest of my days longing for her smile.

She means the world to me and I only endure this conflict knowing it is to protect her back home.\nBut we are separated for a long time now and my letters are not being answered and that makes me wary.
You're not receiving any letters from her anymore?
We've been writing to each other almost daily. But few weeks back, she suddenly stopped. I have not received a reply since.
That is strange, but it could be due to number of reasons...
Yes, I know it is easily explainable given the situation and the place, but it still makes me uneasy that something could be going on.
I am sure everything is alright, Nikolai, and you'll sson hear from Ekaterina as well.
You are too kind, Sergey. Thank you.
How did you find this place?
The same day I found you. It was a very eventful day.
I do like it here.
That makes two of us.
Cheers!
Bottoms up!
I think even four of us.
I vowed to help them. I promised them we would honour our deal and leave the island in their hands. Instead, they were murdered in cold blood.
How could you, Grigory? And why did I simply walk away instead of trying to help? I could have done something, I should have done something...
You look troubled. Something on your mind?
Nothing I would bother you with. It's this place, it makes me thoughtful.
Right you are. You know, I like you, Sergey, I'm glad we met.
I'm glad too, Nikolay.
To a new friendship then! Cheers!
Cheers!
You know, Ekaterina actually has a cute sister...
Dear God...
... that keeps asking me about my friends from the army.
Don't continue.
I think yo should come with me when we go back...
I don't think so.
i would love to have you in the family as well!
I don't really care at the moment.
The moment is fleeting, you will care once the war is over! And you'll gladly return home when there is someone waiting for you there!
Come on, Nikolay!
It's settled, I'm looking forward to it already!
BAZA TO YURY, OUR FORCES ARE READY. LEAD THEM TO MORTON AND BEYOND, COMRADE KUKUSHKIN. THE OPERATION IS FULLY IN YOUR HANDS. BAZA OUT.
FOXTROT TO YURY, WE'RE RIGHT BEHIND YOU. WE SHALL FOLLOW YOUR LEAD! OUT.
YURY TO ALL UNITS, I COMMENCE THE OPERATION. ON ME, COMRADES! WE SHALL STRIKE FAST AND WE SHALL STRIKE HARD! THE RUSSIAN BEAR NEVER SLEEPS! ONWARDS!
MORTON IS IN OUR SIGHTS! ON ME, COMRADES, FORWARD! FOR THE MOTHERLAND!
YURY TO ALL UNITS, THE VILLAGE IS OURS! SEND IN THE INFANTRY. OVER.

BAZA TO YURY, WELL DONE. BE CAREFUL, THE ENEMY CONCETRATES HIS FORCES IN THE VALLEY UP AHEAD. INTEL SUGGESTS THERE IS A MASSIVE TANK FORCE WAITING FOR YOU. WE DON'T HAVE ANY ADDITIONAL SUPPORT FOR YOU, THIS WILL BE STRICTLY A TANK BATTLE. MAKE US PROUD, COMRADE! BAZA OUT.
YOU HEARD HIM, COMRADES. REGROUP AND GET READY FOR THE FIGHT OF YOUR LIVES! FOLLOW ME!
TATYANA TO YURY, WE'VE TRAVERSED THE WHOLE VALLEY AND THERE ARE NO SIGNS OF THE ENEMY. WHERE ARE THEY?
WATCH OUT! IT'S A TRAP! EVERYONE, DEFEND YOURSELVES!
YURY TO BAZA, WE DESTROYED THE ENEMY ARMOUR! IT WAS A HARD FOUGHT BATTLE, BUT THE RUSSIAN BEAR PREVAILED! WE'RE MOVING OUT TO SEIZE LEVIE. OUT.
BAZA TO YURY, EXTRAORDINARY WORK, COMRADE. LEVIE SHOULD NOT BE AN ISSUE, MOST OF THE ENEMY FORCES SHOULD BE RETREATING TO THE SOUTH. REACH THE VILLAGE TO SEAL OUR VICTORY. BAZA OUT.
YURY TO ALL UNITS, WE REACHED LEVIE. THE ENEMY HAS RETREATED. WE BESTED THEIR FORCES AND SHOWED THEM THE EXTENT OF THE SOVIET MIGHT! MOTHER RUSSIA IS PROUD ON YOU ALL, COMRADES! WELL DONE. OUT.
Enemy Tanks
Soviet Forces
Minefield
SEIZE MORTON
BATTLE THE ENEMY TANKS
REACH LEVIE
